channel.title: How can i add so i cant wear Quest cape if i didnt do every quest? READ!

item.title: How can i add so i cant wear Quest cape if i didnt do every quest? READ!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

if(wearID == 2740){
    if(q1 != 15 && q2 != 15){
        sM("Complete all of the quests first..."):
        return false;
    }
}

item.title: How can i add so i cant wear Quest cape if i didnt do every quest? READ!
item.dc:creator: @gillen6 gillen6
item.description:
@gillen6 wrote:

Hi,

my Request is : How can i make so i need to do every quest before i wear a quest cape?

What does it need? : The players has to complete q1,q2,q3,q5,q6,q7,q8,q9,q10 and q11

so please any one Help me out i made a code like this but that didnt work and i dont know why

if(wearID == 2740 && q1 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q2 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q3 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q5 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q6 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q7 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q8 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q9 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q10 == 15) || (wearID == 2740 && q11 == 15){ else if { sM("you didnt complete all of the quests!!"); }

And then i get 8 errors ???

naamloos-1.jpg665×731

Read full topic
